messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report
Sector vendor prices is currently at 150%.
The station spending power is currently 1993 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 324 Credits.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 1. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.body: Any and all access changes needed, please forward your requests to me.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Whatever that fucking thing the mime has, it's not good for the station.

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: That thing is an anomalous entity and only exists to threaten the station. PLEASE get a mindshield if you haven't done so already.
